name: Something about robots!
description:
Hello there! This is my submission for the Gdevelop weekend jam!

It's a Warioware-like game (vaguely) themed around robots.  The assets have been made by myself. There are 5 mini-games in total and 3 per each round. Controls are shown within the games. I hope you will be  amused. 

Also here's the liluo link!

https://liluo.io/enigmagical/something-about-robots-
